dcterms:creator: Q. Lu
L. Getoor
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation dataset where nodes represent research publications described by a bag of words, and edges stand for citations. The task is to classify articles with respect to their topic.
dcterms:title: Cora Dataset

dcterms:description: The Cheaters dataset represents students in an exam classroom, where nodes are students and edges represent cheating connections. The dataset is designed for binary classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Cheaters Dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic Dataset 1 is designed to test the Laplacian regularization. It consists of nodes sampled uniformly at random, with a ground-truth graph constructed based on a threshold.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset 1
